titles.title: Supporting the designation of "Scouting America Day" in celebration of its 115th anniversary.
Supporting the designation of "Scouting America Day" in celebration of its 115th anniversary.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: This resolution supports the redesignation of a Scouting America Day in celebration of the 115th anniversary of the incorporation of Scouting America (formerly known as Boy Scouts of America).
